大脑耦合模式作为 22q11.2DS 精神病的预测标记UNIGE 团队表明，某些大脑区域之间的过强或过弱的互连可能是该疾病的预测标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Brain-coupling-patterns-as-predictive-markers-for-psychosis-in-22q112DS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Brain-coupling-patterns-as-predictive-markers-for-psychosis-in-22q112DS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbb42072-10f1-4048-a3b0-b2b5043a4cd8 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 08:11:33 -0400 Brain coupling patterns as predictive markers for psychosis in 22q11.2DS
结合三种现有药物的联合疗法显示出治疗视网膜变性的潜力根据国际研究小组在《自然通讯》上发表的一项新研究，药物的重新利用显示出治疗视网膜变性的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Combination-therapy-incorporating- Three-existing-drugs-shows-potential-for-treating-retinal-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Combination-therapy-incorporating- Three-existing-drugs-shows-potential-for-treating-retinal-de Generations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55bd30b3-bb2c-4328-b273-f9f76699b976 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 07:03:45 -0400 Combination therapy incorporating three existing drugs shows potential for treating retinal degenerations

杜克大学-新加坡国立大学推出 LIVE Ventures 以促进学术研究的商业化杜克-新加坡国立大学医学院今天启动了 LIVE Ventures，这是一项价值 2000 万新元的孵化计划，旨在促进创新学术研究的商业化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Duke-NUS-unveils-LIVE-Ventures-to-catalyze-the-commercialization-of-academic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240722/Duke-NUS-unveils-LIVE-Ventures-to-catalyze-the-commercialization-of-academic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=776fa874-cad9-45e0-846c-d534288eae9d Mon, 22 Jul 2024 06:49:34 -0400 Duke-NUS unveils LIVE Ventures to catalyze the commercialization of academic research
